page.shortlink: form layout camera image capture image capture method property
page.description: Defines the method used to capture an image.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Image capture method]* defines what the user does to capture an image. The following methods are available: If you select 'TabOnImage' . If you select 'TapOnAButton' then

item.name: TapOnImage
item.description: The user taps the image (or the missing image HTML if the image is missing) to open the camera to take a new picture.

item.name: TapOnAButton
item.description: The user taps a button to open the camera or select an image from the local file system or photo library.
